unnormalised: Pune, Maharashtra - As demand surges ahead of the festive season, particularly with Onam approaching, manufacturers across India are doubling down on quality control measures. Experts from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi are advising SMEs to implement rigorous inspection protocols at every stage of production.

unnormalised: "From raw material sourcing to the final product packaging, consistent monitoring is crucial," states Dr. Sharma, a professor at IIT Delhi's Department of Mechanical Engineering. "Imagine a batch of biryani spices – if one ingredient is substandard, the entire dish suffers. Similarly, a faulty component can cripple an entire assembly line."
